评论详情: For the price this dress looked elegant and was comfortable.  Perfect thickness of material that had the right amount of stretch. I wore it to a formal wedding with a shawl.
This dress was beautiful. I had my thoughts about it at first, until I tried it on. It was comfortable. The material was perfect.
I guess I just expected something different. I was looking for a nice dress to wear to a wedding. This just felt kind of cheap. Not quite the material I was going for.
Very cheaply made doesnt sit on the body as Model. The hem also was oddly misshapen, tried to make it work. Did not thing the price was worth the purchase.
190 lb, 5’4.5 ordered a large and fit very flattering, wore it to a work holiday party! Got lots of compliments!

I cannot believe the positive reviews this dress has. The material is thin and not good quality. I could not get the seams to line up or adjust the dress to lay properly with the way the rouching was sewn. For reference I ordered a S and am 5'9 135 lbs.

Expected the fit to be a bit tighter and more bodycon. I should have sized down, bought this for a wedding and ended up gifting it to a friend as it was too baggy. I would size down if you want the bodycon feel/look.

评论概述: Really flattering with shape wear under
评论详情: I’m 5’7” 220lbs. I got the xl size and it was a really good fit. Very very flattering, so many compliments. Very comfortable too. I really like the fabric. Thicker than expected which I liked. Doesn’t look cheep in person at all.

This dress never disappoints! The chocolate brown is so beautiful and true to color. The dress fits/hugs at the right spots and looks very classy and flattering. Honestly my favorite dress!!! I know sometimes it’s hard ordering dresses but this material is comfortable easy to move in and has a nice light but not too thin weight/wear. Size is accurate as well, definitely get it!! You won’t regret it!

Very sleek and comfortable dress that not only covered all of the skin keeping me warm longer, but I also received lots of compliments for the design of the dress at the wedding I went to because of the turtle neck flow into the rest of the dress. I will be keeping it for another use sometime. I could even wear it around the house if I wanted to.

This dress is the bomb when I tell you the perfect fix it hugs all the curves the material is soft but thick you don't have to wear a slip. Great value for your money the best part easy care I hand wash roll in a link free cloth and hang to dry.

Not sure what I was expecting with this dress but it far exceeded any expectations I had. It fit beautifully and accentuated the curves in the right places. I would definitely repurchase and recommend this dress to friends.I’m 5’5 - 104 pounds and ordered the extra small  the dress does have good stretch too. Hope this helps someone♥️

I was hesitant about this dress because it looked too form fitting but it was a win! The material wasn’t too thick and wasn’t too thin. It really showed off the curves in my waist. It’s very comfortable and I’ll probably be purchasing another one in a different color. Love this dress!
The fabric was so soft that I couldn't press it

By far one of the most flattering, fitted and stretchy dresses I’ve ever had. Wore it to a Christmas party and it’s ruched in all the right places. It’s is the perfect thickness and not see through. I wore short heeled boots and the dress slightly covered the top of the boot and flows nicely and does not hinder walking. Fits great I got a size small. Stylish yet cute. Wore it to a few Christmas parties
Great material, thicker than expected. Great fit/ true to size.
Fits super well and the quality of the fabric is nice and thick.
My weight is 192 with a lot of hips and the X-Large fit good with some space. Length is perfect

First of all, the color of this dress is the perfect red for the holidays! It is a great midi length dress that fits true to size. The material is stretchy, yet fitted and comfortable. Wore this to a wedding and it was PERFECT. The cinched waist hugs your curves and it doesn’t show sweat after you’ve been dancing! 10/10 would recommend
This dress is very nice, not too thin or see through. Fits very well and good quality.  Planning to purchase in black as well.
So cute and the material is stretchy. Leans a little more casual with the material but you dress it up a little.

Great for holiday gathering. The dress has a flattering fit. It was super comfortable, the correct length even for a shorter person (me) wearing it with a small heel. Received many compliments. Definitely recommend.

This dress is beautiful. Dress it up or down. Perfect green color for the holidays. The ruching on the side helps camouflage the tummy. Form fitting with back slit. True to size.
Perfect fit true to size. And it is extremely flattering. I plan to order it now in several other colors!!!
I bought brown color, size XL. The dress fits well, but the fabric is like a microfiber cloth. Returning.

I was looking for weeks to find an elegant but warmer dress for a winter wedding and this was perfect. It was so comfy, nice thick material but very stretchy. Its super flattering and fit nicely on the waist. I’m usually a size small which is what I ordered originally, but I ended up sizing down to the XS and it was so much better because the small was a little big on the sleeves and neck. I definitely recommend to size down if you’re inbetween sizing! For reference I’m 5’4 120lb

评论概述: such a lovely and comfortable dress, so pretty
评论详情: This dress gets a giant YES for me, it's comfortable and it looks so good and the price, how could you not buy this? Let’s start with the solid army green color, it’s so flattering and the perfect hue to wear in winter and fall, not too light and not too dark, just a perfect color. The high neck mixed with the ruched waist makes this dress beyond flattering as everyone knows that a ruched waist flattens most tummies and the high neck seems to elongate my body which helped to make me feel really pretty in this dress. The slit in the back is fun and so just another added detail that makes this dress a great purchase. I am so pleased with this dress, I can’t wait to wear it to a Christmas party.
Comfortable and. a great fit.

I really wanted to love this dress because it’s quite nice and fits well. However, it arrived with a strong smell like someone had worn it before (and for a good chunk of time). I washed it immediately, but even after that, their body odor or fragrance lingers in the fabric. This is disappointing and concerning in terms of hygiene. It’s a shame because the dress itself is pretty, but can’t give it a good rating given the condition it arrived in.

I wanted to love this dress, but the sleeves were different lengths. They were short for how I like my long sleeves to sit, and the right was roughly an inch shorter than the left. Product will be returned.

I felt confident, comfortable, and beautiful in this dress!  I'm 5'10, have a curvier build with fullness through backside and thigh. I am wearing a Large.  The dress is stretchy but doen't appear cheap.  It hugs your curves perfectly, slims the waist, and elongates the body with its V neckline and overall cut.  If you have curves, BUY IT!
Dress is soft and very classic. The material has some stretch and it fits snug. It is a little see through when bending over but not too bad. It is comfortable to wear and looks nice on.
I love it !!!! I came just in time and it fit fabulous!!!! Loved the stretchy material and the comfort, very flattering!!!!!!
Really comfortable dress, very stretchy. wish i would’ve sized down but overall great!

This dress is amazing! The fabric is super soft and breathable, making it perfect for those cooler days. The fit is flattering without being too clingy, and the sleeves and closed out cleavage give it a nice touch of elegance. It can be very formal but at the same time sexy. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Very comfortable and has stretch to it.
评论详情: I recently added a bodycon dress to my wardrobe, and it has quickly become one of my favorite pieces. The dress is designed to hug every curve, creating a flattering silhouette that exudes confidence. Despite its form-fitting nature, the fabric is incredibly comfortable and allows for easy movement, making it perfect for both casual outings and more formal events.  The material is high-quality and has a slight stretch, ensuring a snug yet comfortable fit. I was particularly impressed with the attention to detail in the stitching and the overall construction of the dress. It feels durable and well-made, which is always a plus.  One of the standout features is the versatility of this dress. It can be dressed up with heels and statement jewelry for a night out or paired with a denim jacket and sneakers for a more laid-back look. The color options are also fantastic, ranging from classic black to vibrant hues that make a statement.  Overall, this bodycon dress is a must-have for anyone

Second time purchasing this dress. The fit is very flattering with the rouching. It’s a bodycon but not overly snug tight. Materials a perfect weight, not heavy but certainly not see through. Has a good stretch to it.  It’s so comfortable and easy to wear. Dress it up or down, it’s perfect for either way. It’s well sewn. Very true to size. I’m 5’5 195lbs and hippie, I’m in a XL. Love this color green!! Good bang for your buck at this price point.

评论概述: I usually buy m size but I got l size large and it’s perfect,not too tight
评论详情: I like it
Fits true to size, is comfortable and classy. Buy it!

Needed a dress last minute for a gala. I didn't know what to expect since ordering it online. It fit/hung nicely. The material is NOT cheap, so no worries about it being see through. The color was true and looked beautiful on my skin. Feels like good sturdy cotton, plenty of stretch. I'd be interested in buying another.

Sophisticated and tasteful, and very attractive! This dress checks all the boxes. I followed the size chart and it fit perfectly.  The only minor complaint I have is that I wish the material was just a tad thicker. I wore shape wear underneath the dress, and you can see the lines of the shape wear through the material. You can also see the lines of my bra. It wasn’t a huge deal for me, but I wish those lines were a little more hidden.  Other than that, I really like everything about it. It hugs my body without being too restrictive. The material is soft and pretty lightweight… it was a little wrinkly straight out of the package, but those wrinkles smoothed out when I put it on.  The ruching is so pretty! It’s at the right shoulder and the left side of the body, which makes the overall look even more regal.  The dress fell a couple inches above my ankles (I’m 5’6”) and it moved very well with me throughout the day when I wore it to work. I absolutely adore the simple design of this dress and highly recommend it. You’ll get a lot of compliments!
Really nice form fitting dress. Hugs every curve. Love the material. I definitely recommend this dress.

This dress is so fire! It is simple and an easy material, but if you are curvy, you need this. It is not sheer or unforgiving. I imagine it will look amazing on various body shapes. Though it seems to run true to size, I sized up to a large 175 lbs, 5'8 and it fit so nicely.

I ordered this dress in black, and it’s exactly what I needed for an upcoming fall event. The long sleeves and back slit add a touch of elegance, and the fit is incredibly flattering. It looks amazing on and is sure to turn heads. Highly recommend!

Although I’m petite and currently 108 lbs, I ordered a medium so that it would not fit me so tightly that my pulse could be visibly read through the fabric! I really like the fit of a medium on me, it’s still form fitting and very figure flattering! I think I’ll chop 5-6” off the bottom to make it slightly more casual. Comfy and so pretty!

This dress hugs your curves in all the right places with the gathering of fabric. I should have went with a medium, but the large fits with plenty of room. I'm 5'7 and 145lb for reference. The material is not too hot even for long sleeves.

This is a great dress that feels so nice and fits wonderfully. The material is soft and stretchy so it is very form fitting and comfortable. I got mine in orange and I accessorize with a nice belt or waist chain and a necklace to complete the look.
Looks exactly like the picture
Didn't like they way it fit me but the build quality is pretty good.
It make me look very elegant and formal. I love the dress. Received many compliments
really loved this dress its cute fits well true to size not see through

This is a nice dress. It fits really well and looks really good on. It’s a nice mauve color for the fall. It is very trendy and body flattering and makes you feel very comfortable in your skin. It’s a good quality material free flowing, comfortable to wear. I definitely recommended.
BEAUTIFUL DRESS I LOVE IT.

This dress is what love looks like... I cannot find anything that I dislike about this dress and it is flattering to ALL bodies! It has quite a bit of stretch so it will hug those beautiful curves, and the rouching gives you a snatched look at all times. My measurements are 34dd-28-40, 5'3, 140lbs, and I ordered a small.

评论概述: Pink in large!!! It’s giving date night
评论详情: This is a beautiful dress! I love the rouched look of this dress. It’s stunning on and my shapewear definitely has my waist looking great. I ordered my normal size a large and it fit nicely. The stretch is definitely there. The neck is tight so I don’t think a medium would have looked as great on me. I wear a 12 in jeans and a large in most dresses. This is a comfortable dress and the fabric is nice .

Very fair price for this dress; it's gorgeous and looks refined while still being comfortable. I like(d) to live in athlesiure, but comfy dresses like this are converting me into a dress girl. Material is very stretchy everywhere, so it's also easy to get a good fit size-wise. I wouldn't call the material "slinky" but it's getting there. I love it  Just please make sure you put this through the wash before wearing. I have a chemical allergy and this made me itch like crazy during the pre-wash try-on. After washing the itch was no more
This is such a cute dress. It can be worn to work, church or out on a date. It is very stretchy. The rouging takes away from your mid section if you have a larger mid section. Soft material.

评论概述: If I could rate this a hundred stars I would
评论详情: I can’t express enough how much I love this dress, it is hands down my new favorite. I’m on the hunt for modest, yet feminine and beautiful clothing, and this dress takes the cake. With the strategically placed ruching, it gives a draped fabric on a marble statue look. It’s so gorgeous and elegant. Creating form and shape to the dress without being overly revealing or skin-tight. I’m also freshly postpartum with a little bit of pudge on my belly, the scrunching on the belly helps compliment my figure in a very subtle way. Even without any shape wear, I feel like this is very flattering, and fits perfectly. I’m an XL, so that’s what I ordered and is true to size. And also with extreme comfort, this maxi dress is such a stretchy, thick, breathable t shirt material. It endured a whole day in hot summer weather and I was comfortable. Despite its stretchy nature, it didn’t blow out and lose form by the end of the day. I adore this color, I would describe it like a soft almond color, a perfect color year round that would match just about anything. I can’t say enough good things about this dress, I want it in every color, I want to wear it every day 😂 the design, the fit, the color, the quality, it’s perfect for me and couldn’t possibly recommend this more!!

This is a cute dress in a nice shade of dusty pink. The ruching adds some interesting draping to the fabric. It does show your body’s shape quite nicely, but if there are any areas where you’re not as comfortable, it will also show pretty clearly.  Overall though, I really like this dress and enjoy the effect of the body hugging shape.

I love this dress. I love everything about it. The only downside for me is that I live in Florida so there’s only like 3-4 months out of the year I can wear a long sleeve dress. It is thin though, not see through thin, just lightweight (material is 93% Viscose, 7% Elastane).  It’s comfortable and there’s some stretch to it. I love the lake blue color. It’s gorgeous. I’m 5’9” and around 150 lbs and ordered a medium and this fits perfectly. It’s form fitting but not tight. I’m definitely going to wear Skims underneath just to smooth it out but I would with pretty much any dress. I have a few items from this brand and they’re all great and good quality. This is a great dress and I highly recommend.

评论概述: A Very Elegant Long Sleeve Dress
评论详情: This is a very nice and elegant body con, long sleeve dress. The green color that I ordered is very pretty goes very well with accessories. With it, you can dress up or play down as the dress accommodates both styles. It fits well a 5’7” 140 pounds woman with a tiny waist. I recommend it.

I rarely buy dresses that are made of jersey-type fabric. Let's face it - they amplify every curve and bump. But I liked the look of this style, so gave it a try. And I'm so glad I did!  The dress is uncomplicated - i.e., it's easy to put on. Just pull it over your head and voilà. The fabric is soft and shockingly thick, giving it a very quality feel. I was immediately in love with the style - simple and elegant. It had some light ruching in just the right places. That said, I will still be wearing shape wear underneath to smooth out my bits, but I am absolutely thrilled with it.  It's definitely a new favorite!

This is a really beautiful dress that's very form fitting. I like the ripples in the front as it hides the muffin top but it snugs the body in all the right places. Husband said it looks really nice. My only complaint is that fabric wrinkles so gotta take it out of thd dryer right away.

评论概述: Love the fit, but the color is a little off
评论详情: I knocked off a star because the color of this dress is much less bright and rich than the listing. It's a dull olive color, which isn't really what I wanted.  That being said, the fit of this dress is spot on. It is stretchy, thick enough to not show every lump and bump, but not too heavy. I cannot wait for fall to wear this. The ruching on the one shoulder and hip is super flattering and adds visual interest. I ordered according to the size chart and I have a little extra room, I could have fit into a smaller size, but it looks much better a little looser. Nice long length, and a slit in the back to make it super easy to walk. Just wish I had chosen a different color.

What a beautiful dress. It’s a spring, summer, fall dress. The material stretches. Knit and light Very body clinging. Wear anytime, with whatever you like! 👍🏼 Accessorize and the dress 👗 will still stand out! Worth it Buy it..🏖️😎🤩✌🏽🌴🌊🌊🌊
